name: MLUpdateTask
desc: A task that updates a model with additional training data.

items.name: init(forModelAt: URL, trainingData: MLBatchProvider, completionHandler: (MLUpdateContext) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a task that updates the model at the URL with the training data, and calls the completion handler when the update completes.

items.name: init(forModelAt: URL, trainingData: MLBatchProvider, progressHandlers: MLUpdateProgressHandlers)
items.desc: Creates a task that updates the model at the URL with the training data, and calls the progress handlers during and after the update.

items.name: init(forModelAt: URL, trainingData: MLBatchProvider, configuration: MLModelConfiguration?, completionHandler: (MLUpdateContext) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a task that updates the model at the URL with the training data and configuration, and calls the completion handler when the update completes.

items.name: init(forModelAt: URL, trainingData: MLBatchProvider, configuration: MLModelConfiguration?, progressHandlers: MLUpdateProgressHandlers)
items.desc: Creates a task that updates the model at the URL with the training data and configuration, and calls the progress handlers during and after the update.

items.name: protocol MLBatchProvider
items.desc: An interface that represents a collection of feature providers.

items.name: class MLModelConfiguration
items.desc: The settings for creating or updating a machine learning model.

items.name: class MLUpdateContext
items.desc: The context an update task provides to your appâ€™s completion and update progress handlers.

items.name: class MLUpdateProgressHandlers
items.desc: A collection of closures an update task uses to notify your app of its progress.

items.name: func resume(withParameters: [MLParameterKey : Any])
items.desc: Resumes a model update with updated parameter values.

items.name: class MLParameterKey
items.desc: The keys for the parameter dictionary in a model configuration or a model update context.
